name: DOOM GUYS (Demo)
description:
Rip and Tear!!!

The Doom Slayer has been imprisoned by Fall Guys. Now he has one thing in mind, making them regret!

Play as the Doom Slayer, Demon Hunter of the depths of hell in a very strange adventure. After being kidnapped by Fall Guys while you were sleeping, you are sent to their prison temple.

Now you are trapped in a labyrinth of walls. Use your strength to to destroy walls,  Run though the temple at full speed and kill every Fall Guy along the way!

(THIS GAME IS A PARODY)

Features:
  • Unique visuals with 3 different environments!
  • Amazing Level Design!
  • 4 Weapons!  (Including a Super Mega Secret Weapon)
  • 3 Enemy Types!
  • An episode of the Fall Guys TV Show !!!!!
Controls:
  • [WASD/ZQSD] Move
  • [Left/Right] Control Camera
  • [Space] Shoot
  • [C] Change weapon
  • [Escape] Quit game
